summary: THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED THE SAME DEFECT WITH THE CLOCK SPRING AS STATED IN RECALL NUMBER 02V 293 000  BUT THE MODEL YEAR AND VEHICLE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER WERE NOT INCLUDED.   *NLM   AN ELECTRICAL SHORT STARTED AND WAS REPLACED PER  MECHANIC.  THE HORN STOPPED WORKING DUE TO THE AIR BAG.  THE CONSUMER WAS INFORMED THE SAME PART MALFUNCTIONED IN THE 1996, 97, AND 98 DODGE CARAVAN'S.   *SCC
